sections.title: What is this app for?
sections.content: The LLF Machine Inspection app helps engineers and workers manage, perform, and track machine inspections, ensuring no inspection is missed and all machine data stays organized.

sections.title: Who can use this app?
sections.content: There are two user roles in the app: Engineers and Workers.
bulletPoints: Engineers: Assign machines, schedule inspections, and monitor reports.
Workers: View assigned machines and submit inspection reports.

sections.title: How do I reset my password?
sections.content: On the login screen, tap 'Forgot Password?' and follow the instructions sent to your registered email.

sections.title: How do I submit an inspection?
sections.content: Follow these steps to submit an inspection:
bulletPoints: Tap the machine scheduled for today or pending.
Fill out the checklist and submit.

sections.title: What do 'Pending' and 'Escalated' mean?
sections.content: Machine inspection statuses indicate the following:
bulletPoints: Pending: Missed inspection that needs to be completed as soon as possible.
Escalated: An issue was reported and requires engineer intervention.

sections.title: Can I use the app offline?
sections.content: Currently, an internet connection is required to sync your data with our servers.

sections.title: Is my data secure?
sections.content: Yes, your data is protected with secure servers and encrypted communications. For more details, review our Privacy Policy.

sections.title: How do I contact support?
sections.content: If you need assistance, reach out to us using the contact options below.
